exmls.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
             source="button_up_png"
             source.down="button_down_png"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="8" bottom="8" left="8" right="8"
             size="20" fontFamily="Tahoma 'Microsoft Yahei'"
             textColor="0xFFFFFF" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
    <e:Image id="iconDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.CheckBoxSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Group width="100%" height="100%">
        <e:layout>
            <e:HorizontalLayout verticalAlign="middle"/>
        </e:layout>
        <e:Image fillMode="scale" alpha="1" alpha.disabled="0.5" alpha.down="0.7"
                 source="checkbox_unselect_png"
                 source.upAndSelected="checkbox_select_up_png"
                 source.downAndSelected="checkbox_select_down_png"
                 source.disabledAndSelected="checkbox_select_disabled_png"/>
        <e:Label id="labelDisplay" size="20" textColor="0x707070"
                 textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
                 fontFamily="Tahoma"/>
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.HScrollBarSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="8" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="roundthumb_png" scale9Grid="3,3,2,2" height="8" width="30" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.HSliderSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="8" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="track" source="track_sb_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="100%"
             height="6" verticalCenter="0"/>
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="thumb_png" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ItemRendererSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
             source="button_up_png"
             source.down="button_down_png"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="8" bottom="8" left="8" right="8"
             size="20" fontFamily="Tahoma 'Microsoft Yahei'"
             textColor="0xFFFFFF" text="{data}" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.PanelSkin" minHeight="230" minWidth="450" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image left="0" right="0" bottom="0"  top="0" source="border_png" scale9Grid="2,2,12,12" />
    <e:Group id="moveArea" left="0" right="0" top="0" height="45">
        <e:Image left="0" right="0" bottom="0"  top="0" source="header_png"/>
        <e:Label id="titleDisplay" size="20" fontFamily="Tahoma" textColor="0xFFFFFF"
                 wordWrap="false" left="15" right="5" verticalCenter="0"/>
    </e:Group>
    <e:Button id="closeButton" label="close" bottom="5" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ProgressBarSkin" minWidth="30" minHeight="18" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image source="track_pb_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="100%"
			 height="100%" verticalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image id="thumb" height="100%" width="100%" source="thumb_pb_png"/>
	<e:Label id="labelDisplay" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
			 size="15" fontFamily="Tahoma" textColor="0x707070"
			 horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.RadioButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Group width="100%" height="100%">
        <e:layout>
            <e:HorizontalLayout verticalAlign="middle"/>
        </e:layout>
        <e:Image fillMode="scale" alpha="1" alpha.disabled="0.5" alpha.down="0.7"
                 source="radiobutton_unselect_png"
                 source.upAndSelected="radiobutton_select_up_png"
                 source.downAndSelected="radiobutton_select_down_png"
                 source.disabledAndSelected="radiobutton_select_disabled_png"/>
        <e:Label id="labelDisplay" size="20" textColor="0x707070"
                 textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
                 fontFamily="Tahoma"/>
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ScrollerSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="20" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:HScrollBar id="horizontalScrollBar" width="100%" bottom="0"/>
    <e:VScrollBar id="verticalScrollBar" height="100%" right="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="skins.TextInputSkin" minHeight="40" minWidth="300" states="normal,disabled,normalWithPrompt,disabledWithPrompt" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" source="button_up_png"/>
	<e:Rect height="100%" width="100%" fillColor="0xffffff"/>
 	<e:EditableText id="textDisplay" verticalCenter="0" left="10" right="10"
	                textColor="0x000000" textColor.disabled="0xff0000" width="100%" height="24" size="20" />
	<e:Label id="promptDisplay" verticalCenter="0" left="10" right="10"
	                textColor="0xa9a9a9" width="100%" height="24" size="20" touchEnabled="false" includeIn="normalWithPrompt,disabledWithPrompt"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ToggleSwitchSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image source="on_png"
             source.up="off_png"
             source.down="off_png"
             source.disabled="off_png"/>
    <e:Image source="handle_png"
             horizontalCenter="-18"
             horizontalCenter.upAndSelected="18"
             horizontalCenter.downAndSelected="18"
             horizontalCenter.disabledAndSelected="18"
             verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.VScrollBarSkin" minWidth="8" minHeight="20" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="roundthumb_png" scale9Grid="3,3,2,2" height="30" width="8" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.VSliderSkin" minWidth="25" minHeight="30" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="track" source="track_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="7" height="100%" horizontalCenter="0"/>
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="thumb_png" horizontalCenter="0" />
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="MenuButtonSkin"
        states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image x="0" y="0" source="btn_shrink_bg"/>
	<e:Image y="16" source="btn_shrink" x="59" includeIn="upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" scaleX="-1"/>
	<e:Image includeIn="up,down,disabled" x="19" y="16" source="btn_shrink"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="GuiScreenSkin" width="650" height="1000" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:ns1="*">
	<e:Image source="table_cloud_top" fillMode="repeat" left="0" right="0" y="150"/>
	<e:Rect height="150" fillColor="0xebfff8" left="0" right="0" top="0"/>
	<e:Rect fillColor="15466488" height="100" left="0" right="0" bottom="0"/>
	<e:Image source="table_cloud_bottom" fillMode="repeat" left="0" right="0" bottom="100"/>
	<e:Group height="170" left="0" right="0" top="0">
		<e:Group horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0">
			<e:Image source="icon_name" x="140" y="9" width="218" height="78"/>
			<e:Image source="icon_head" x="20" y="19" width="135"/>
			<e:Image id="headDisplay" height="95" width="95" x="36" y="43"/>
			<e:Image source="icon_LV" x="0" y="-1" width="83" height="83"/>
			<e:Group width="160" height="30" x="166" y="34">
				<e:Label id="nameDisplay" text="_羽" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" textColor="3710089" size="21" bold="true"/>
			</e:Group>
			<e:Image source="icon_badge" x="104" y="96"/>
			<e:Group x="164" y="96">
				<e:Image source="icon_line" x="17" y="0"/>
				<e:Group width="142" height="30" x="49" y="15">
					<e:Label id="levelDisplay" size="21" horizontalCenter="0" bold="true" verticalCenter="0" textColor="3710089" text="0/220"/>
				</e:Group>
				<e:Image source="icon_experience" x="0" y="0"/>
			</e:Group>
			<e:Group x="369" y="22">
				<e:Image y="0" source="icon_line" x="17"/>
				<e:Group y="15" width="142" height="30" x="49">
					<e:Label id="goldDisplay" size="21" horizontalCenter="0" bold="true" verticalCenter="0" textColor="3710089" text="1200"/>
				</e:Group>
				<e:Image y="0" x="0" source="icon_gold"/>
			</e:Group>
			<e:Group y="96" x="394">
				<e:Image y="0" source="icon_line" x="17"/>
				<e:Group y="15" width="142" height="30" x="49">
					<e:BitmapLabel id="diamondDisplay" text="99" font="bitmapFont" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Group>
				<e:Image y="0" x="0" source="icon_diamond"/>
			</e:Group>
		</e:Group>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group height="120" left="0" right="0" bottom="0">
		<e:layout>
			<e:HorizontalLayout gap="20" verticalAlign="middle" horizontalAlign="center"/>
		</e:layout>
		<e:Image id="friendBtn" source="icon_friend" x="80" y="71"/>
		<e:Image id="shopBtn" source="icon_shop" x="112" y="53" width="114" height="99"/>
		<e:Image id="warehouseBtn" source="icon_warehouse" x="157" y="136"/>
		<e:Image id="factoryBtn" source="icon_factory" x="110" y="148"/>
		<e:Image id="moreBtn" source="icon_more" x="150" y="149"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:ToggleButton id="menuBtn" label="切换按钮" skinName="MenuButtonSkin" x="14" y="237"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="LoadingUISkin" width="400" height="300" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Label id="txtMsg" text="资源加载中..." width="249" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" size="25" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="LoginUISkin" width="556" height="406" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:TextInput id="txtName" x="56" y="83"/>
	<e:TextInput id="txtPass" x="56" y="196"/>
	<e:Label text="登陆名" x="59" y="49"/>
	<e:Label text="密码" x="60" y="141"/>
	<e:Button id="btnLogin" label="登陆" x="254" y="298"/>
	
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="MenuSkin" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Group>		<e:Image source="menu_bg" scale9Grid="23,29,29,24" width="100%" height="100%"/>		<e:Group>			<e:Image id="dailyBtn" source="btn_activity" />			<e:Image id="taskBtn" source="btn_mission"/>			<e:Image id="mailBtn" source="btn_mail" />			<e:Image id="bbsBtn" source="bbs" scaleX="1.6" scaleY="1.6"/>			<e:layout >				<e:HorizontalLayout  verticalAlign="middle" paddingLeft="20" paddingRight="20" paddingBottom="10" paddingTop="10"/>			</e:layout>		</e:Group>	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="PanelSkin" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Group width="100%" height="100%" touchEnabled="true" touchChildren="true">
		<e:Rect width="100%" height="100%" x="0" y="0" fillAlpha="0" fillColor="0"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group width="505" height="600" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0">
		<e:Group left="0" right="0" bottom="0" top="50">
			<e:Rect fillColor="0x097993" width="480" x="11" bottom="16" top="16"/>
			<e:Image source="table_box_down" x="0" bottom="0" locked="true"/>
			<e:Image source="table_box_up" x="0" top="0" locked="true"/>
			<e:Image source="table_box_middle" x="0" top="46" bottom="93" locked="true"/>
			<e:Group id="contentGroup" left="30" right="30" bottom="40" top="40"/>
		</e:Group>
		<e:Button id="closeBtn" x="452" y="28">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
					<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="btn_wrong" source.down="btn_wrong" source.disabled="btn_wrong"/>
					<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
		<e:Group horizontalCenter="0" top="0">
			<e:Image source="table_bg" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			<e:Image id="iconDisplay" source="table_activity" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
		</e:Group>
		<e:Image id="button" y="552" horizontalCenter="0"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="RegUISkin" width="556" height="406" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:TextInput id="txtName" x="56" y="83"/>
	<e:TextInput id="txtPass" x="56" y="196"/>
	<e:Label text="登陆名" x="59" y="49"/>
	<e:Label text="密码" x="60" y="141"/>
    <e:Label text="密码确认" x="60" y="171"/>
	<e:Button id="btnReg" label="注册" x="254" y="298"/>
	
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="SaleItemSkin" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image source="card_bg"/>
	<e:Group height="34" width="137" x="22" y="12">
		<e:Label id="titleDisplay" text="普通化肥" textColor="16777215" size="21" bold="true" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Image id="iconDisplay" source="icon_fertilizer02" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="5"/>
	<e:Image source="icon_diamond" scaleX="0.5" scaleY="0.5" width="60" y="56" x="123"/>
	<e:Label id="priceDisplay" text="3" x="151" y="57" size="20" bold="true" textColor="3710089"/>
	<e:Image source="icon_02" x="8" y="134"/>
	<e:Label id="timeDisplay" text="-10分钟" x="47" y="144" size="20" bold="true" textColor="3710089"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="TabBarButtonSkin"
        states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image includeIn="up,down,disabled" x="0" y="0" source="tabBar_down"/>
	<e:Image id="iconDisplaySelected" includeIn="up,down,disabled" x="18" y="7" source="text_fertilizer01"/>
	<e:Image includeIn="upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" x="0" y="0" source="tabBar_selected_down"/>
	<e:Image id="iconDisplay" includeIn="upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" x="18" y="10" source="text_fertilizer02"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="TabBarSkin" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Group width="100%" height="100%">
		<e:TabBar id="tabBar" left="10" top="5">
			<e:layout>
				<e:HorizontalLayout gap="5"/>
			</e:layout>		</e:TabBar>		<e:Image source="sto_table_tittle" x="0" y="50"/>		<e:Scroller left="25" right="25" top="85" height="385">			<e:ViewStack id="viewStack"/>		</e:Scroller>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="TaskItemRendererSkin" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image source="task_bg"/>
	<e:Group height="39" width="204" x="80" y="4">
		<e:Label id="labelDisplay" text="标签" textColor="5918538" size="21" horizontalCenter="1.5" verticalCenter="1" bold="true"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Image id="iconDisplay" source="icon_experience" verticalCenter="0.5" x="13"/>
	<e:Image source="icon_experience" verticalCenter="20.5" x="205" width="26" height="26"/>
	<e:Image source="icon_gold" x="81" y="50" width="25" height="25"/>
	<e:Label id="goldDisplay" textColor="5918538" text="+100" size="20" fontFamily="SimSun" y="50" x="109" bold="true"/>
	<e:Label id="seedDisplay" text="+100" textColor="5918538" x="233" size="20" fontFamily="SimSun" y="50" bold="true"/>
	<e:Label id="progressDisplay" textColor="5918538" text="0/5" size="20" fontFamily="SimSun" verticalCenter="0" horizontalCenter="139" bold="true"/>
</e:Skin>
